articles.description:
David Archuleta (Facebook)



"American Idol" first runner-up David Archuleta announced on Instagram June 13 that he is a member of the LGBTQIA+ community.



Archuleta also revealed that he came out as gay to his family in 2014.

articles.title: America is back: France’s Macron says Biden is ‘part of the club’ - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The United States is back as a cooperative leader of the free world under President Joe Biden, France’s Emmanuel Macron said on Saturday, illustrating the relief felt by many key US allies that the tumult of Donald Trump’s presidency is over.
